about_the_game:
In the middle of an execution mission, the biomechatronic unit Cots-75 suddenly begins to malfunction. Its mechanical parts start to fail critically due to the damage received, trapping model 75 in a virtual training simulation. Now, unlike the countless hours spent in training, the risk is real. It must use a variety of weapons to try to survive and find a way out of this simulated nightmare!

  • Dodge, push, block, and use your arsenal of weapons to eliminate enemies in addictive close-quarters combat. Take advantage of the environment around you to buy time, and make sure you always have a bullet in the chamber to stop enemies at long range!

  • Fight against waves of enemies in 7 different levels, each with a unique finale or a boss fight.

  • Beware of the Disruptors! They will try to end your adventure long before you expect. Disruptors are enemies with different attacks and abilities. Some may even use objects and structures to their advantage.

  • Create different combinations according to your playstyle using 21 software options and 6 hardware types. The hardware is especially important; it can save you from difficult situations and even help you dodge death. Try each one in your HUB before heading into a mission!

  • Modify your weapons and optimize them. Each weapon can have various options and buffs that affect its performance against hordes or armored enemies, for example. The optimizations are designed for you to freely switch between them until you find the one that best suits your gameplay!

Post-launch plans:

  • Twitch Integration: It will be possible to add more variety and unpredictability to the game, whether you’re a streamer or not. For streamers, the integration adds more interaction, allowing the chat to decide some future events in your game.

  • Support for mods.

content_descriptors.notes: This Game may contain content not appropriate for all ages: Frequent Violence or Gore, General Mature Content.
